snippet: The reggaetón duo Wisin y Yandel move further into pop territory, while Giant Giant Sand makes a “country rock opera.”
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews album by reggaeton duo Wisin y Yandel; Jon Pareles reviews CD by country band Giant Giant Sand; Nate Chinen reviews album by jazz performer Henry Threadgill with sextet Zooid.

byline.original: By BEN RATLIFF, JON PARELES and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: The reggaetón duo Wisin y Yandel move further into pop territory, while Giant Giant Sand makes a “country rock opera.”

headline.seo: Albums From Wisin y Yandel and Giant Giant Sand
